This property verifies that the signal e_cnt is reset to zero exactly one clock cycle after the reset signal becomes active. 

The assertion triggers on every positive edge of the clock signal clk, but is disabled when reset is low. When the reset signal becomes high (1), the property requires that on the very next clock cycle, the value of e_cnt must be 0.
